page.title: 16FRENCH STUDENTS IN HERNE BAY
page.content: The months of July and August bring an influx of French students to the streets of Herne Bay. Normally they are teenagers and they are accommodated with Herne Bay families for their 25 day stay. As the families receive Â£180 to provide board and lodging for these students they are eagerly welcomed and children of the family may have to share a bedroom as the French students must have their own room. The students mainly come to improve their English and they have a well planned programme of visits including two trips to London and other activities. Half their day is devoted to sports and half to English lessons. During the day they are based at St Mary's College an old Hotel near the station. The students must be at the College by 9.15a.m.and they finish at 5.15. Must be in lodgings by 9.15pm
